They can be eaten by themselves, in soups or stews, with gravy, or in any other way. While some dumplings resemble solid water-boiled doughs, such as gnocchi, others such as wontons or ravioli feature a wrapping of dough around a filling.

Fried Durian.description: This dessert is more common in summer, as this is when the durian is in season.

Fried Egg.description: A fried egg, is a cooked dish made from one or more eggs which are removed from their shells and placed into a frying pan, and fried with minimal accompaniment. Fried eggs are traditionally eaten for breakfast in many countries but may also be served at other times of the day.

Fried Eggplant.description:
It is an eggplant dish from the Turkish cuisine. It is such a common dish during summer months that this season used to be called "patlıcan kızartma ayları" (fried eggplant months) in Ottoman Istanbul where this generalized frying caused huge fires and destroyed entire mahalles due to the abundance of old wooden houses.Turkish style patlıcan kızartması is usually eaten with a garlic yogurt or tomato sauce. In the Arab cuisine fried eggplant is served with a tahini sauce.

source url: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fried_eggplant

Fried Green Tomatoes.description:
Fried green tomatoes are a side dish usually found in the Southern United States, made from unripe (green) tomatoes coated with cornmeal and fried

Wiki

Fried Halloumi Cheese.description: Fried Halloumi Cheese is a dish from New Zealand. Halloumi or haloumi is a semi-hard, unripened, brined cheese made from a mixture of goat's and sheep's milk, and sometimes also cow's milk. It has a high melting point and so can easily be fried or grilled.

Fried Ice Cream.ingredients: ice cream, oil, cornflake crumbs, cinnamon
Fried Ice Cream.description: Fried Ice Cream is a dessert made from a breaded scoop of ice cream that is quickly deep-fried creating a warm, crispy shell around the still-cold ice cream. This fried ice cream ice cream recipe features vanilla ice cream, corn flakes, sugar and cinnamon.

Fried Idli.ingredients: parboiled rice, split black gram skinless (dhuli urad dal), fenugreek seeds (methi dana), salt, dry red chilli, oil, garlic, green chilli, spring onion greens, ginger, vegetable stock, tomato ketchup, salt, vinegar
Fried Idli.description: Crisp fried steam idlis served hot with Sichuan sauce.

Fried Okra Cornmeal.description: This fried okra cornmeal is a southern classic, its taste turned out perfectly.

Fried Oyster Omelette.description:
Crisp on the outside, soft and gooey on the inside. Scatters of mussels accompanied the egg with a fiery hot chili sauce on the side.
https://bellasupiana.com/2014/04/27/penang-fried-oyster-omelette-shins-rocking-tomato-sauce-and-a-spice-run/

Fried Pie.description: Fried pies are mainly dessert pies that are similar to turnovers, except that they are smaller and fried. The fruit filling is wrapped in the dough, similar to the dough of a pie crust.

Fried Rice.description: Common staple in American Chinese cuisine. It consist of steamed rice stir-fried in a wok, often mixed with other ingredients, such as eggs, vegetables, and meat.

Fried Sage Leaves.ingredients: flour, salt, pepper, spices, sage leaves, water
Fried Sage Leaves.description: Fried sage leaves or Patha Bhaja is Bangladeshi and Italian dish. It is a kind of appetizer.It is prepared with flour, salt, pepper, spices, sage leaves, water. It is very easy to make and delicious.

Fried Soft-shell Crab.ingredients: flour, salt, pepper, oil, milk, eggs, soft-shell crab.
Fried Soft-shell Crab.description: Fried Soft-Shell Crab is an American snack that originated from New Orleans. Soft-shell crab is a culinary term for crabs that have recently moulted their old exoskeleton and are still soft. Soft-shells are removed from the water as soon as they moult to prevent any hardening of their shell. Softshell crab is mixed with flour, salt, pepper, milk, egg and deep-fried in oil.

Fried Spider.description: Fried spider is a regional snack in Cambodia. It is also the street food of Cambodia. Usually, spider is fried and seasoned and served with sauce. It is very crispy and delicious.

Fried Wonton.description: Fried wontons are served with a meat filling, (usually pork), and eaten with duck sauce, plum sauce, sweet and sour sauce, or hot mustard. A version of fried wontons are filled with a cream cheese and crab filling; these are called crab rangoon.

Frigarui.description: Frigarui is a Romanian dish consisting of small pieces of meat (usually pork, beef, mutton, lamb or chicken) grilled on a skewer, similar to shashlik or shish kebab. It is seasoned with spices such as pepper, garlic, savoury, rosemary, marjoram and laurel.

Frijoles.description: Frijoles are widely consumed in Peruvian cuisine. Navy beans are cooked with spices and pork belly for flavor. Frijoles are the standard side dish of the traditional Seco.

Frijoles Charros.ingredients: bacon, chorizo, ham, tomatoes, oil, onions, garlic, peppers, cilantro, cooked beans
Frijoles Charros.description: Frijoles charros is a traditional Mexican dish. It is named after the traditional Mexican cowboy horsemen, or charros. The dish is characterized by pinto beans stewed with onion, garlic, and bacon. Other common ingredients include chili peppers, tomatoes, cilantro, ham, sausage, pork and chorizo. It is served warm, and is usually of a soupy consistency. Mexican people think it is very tasty for soupy type food and healthy.

Frijoles Negros.description: Frijoles Negros is a Hispanic nutritious dish made with black beans, prepared in Cuba, Venezuela (where it is called Caraotas Negras), Puerto Rico, Mexico, and other nations in Latin America except in Brazil. Generally served as a staple side dish, these are not only sumptuous but also very nutritious.

Frijoles Rojos.description: Frijoles Rojos is a side dish mostly present in every Latin American cuisine. Kidney beans are cooked with spices and sometimes pork is added for flavor.

Frikadeller.description: Frikadeller is a flat, pan-fried dumplings of minced meat, often likened to the Danish version of meatballs.

Frikkadel.description: Frikkadel is a traditional Afrikaans dish comprising usually baked, but sometimes deep-fried, meatballs prepared with onion, bread, eggs, vinegar and spices.

Fritada.description: Fritada is a typical dish in Ecuadorian cuisine. It is a traditional dish and Its main ingredient is fried pork.

Fritaja.description: Fritaja is a Mediterranean Croatian and Slovenian dish. They are especially common in the springtime, as at that time there are many plants and vegetables such as wild asparagus, wild hops, herbs as fennel, mint, feverfew and chicory, tomatoes, young garlic sprouts and spices available to add to egg and some other ingredients, as small parts of old bread.

Fritelli.description: Fritelli is a type of Corsican doughnuts or fritters made from fried wheat or chestnut flour.

Frito Pie.ingredients: chili con carne, cheese, corn chips
Frito Pie.description:
Frito pie is a dish popular in the Southern, Midwestern, and Southwestern United States, whose basic ingredients are chili, cheese, and corn chips. 




https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frito_pie

Frittata.description:
It is an egg-based Italian dish similar to an omelette or crustless quiche, enriched with additional ingredients such as meats, cheeses, vegetables or pasta. The word frittata is Italian and roughly translates to "fried".

source link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frittata

Fritter.description: A fritter is a portion of dough, meat, seafood, fruit, vegetables or other ingredients which have been battered or breaded and fried. Fritters are prepared in both sweet and savory varieties. Wikipedia

Fritule.ingredients: batter, rum, citrus zest, raisins, powdered sugar
Fritule.description: Fritule is a festive Croatian pastry made particularly for Christmas. They resemble little doughnuts, the Italian zeppole, Venetian fritole, and the Dutch Christmas snack oliebollen balls of oil. However, they are usually flavored with rum and citrus zest, containing raisins, and are topped with powdered sugar.

Frogeye Salad.ingredients: acini di pepe pasta, marshmallows, whipped topping, egg yolks, fruits
Frogeye Salad.description:
a type of pasta salad. It is made with acini di pepe pasta, whipped topping and egg yolks. Fruit, such as mandarin oranges and pineapples, are often mixed in, and it is sometimes topped with marshmallows. The salad has a strong regional presence in Utah and surrounding states, especially among members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in the Mormon Corridor.



https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frogeye_salad

Froutalia.ingredients: sausages, potatoes, cheese, milk, eggs, parsley, salt, pepper, oil
Froutalia.description: A super tasty and super easy traditional dish from Greek. Froutalia can be made with a variety of ingredients like sausages, potatoes, cheese, eggs.

Frozen Banana.ingredients: bananas, chocolate, nuts, sprinkles, sugar, crushed cookies
Frozen Banana.description:
Frozen bananas are desserts made by placing a banana upon a stick, freezing it, and usually dipping it in melted chocolate. They may be covered with toppings such as chopped nuts, sprinkles, sugar and crushed cookies.



https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frozen_banana

Frozen Custard.description: Frozen Custard is a cold dessert similar to ice cream, but made with eggs in addition to cream and sugar.

Frozen Persimmon.description: Frozen Persimmon is a low-calorie Korean dessert that is surprisingly tasty and simple.

Frozen Yogurt.description: It  is a frozen dessert made with yogurt and sometimes other dairy products. It is usually more tart than ice cream.

Fruitcake.ingredients: candied fruit, dried fruit, nuts, spices, sugars, flour
Fruitcake.description:
A cake made with chopped candied fruit and/or dried fruit, nuts, and spices, and (occasionally) soaked in spirits. Fruit cakes are typically served in celebration of weddings and Christmas. Given their rich nature, fruit cake is most often consumed on its own, as opposed to with condiments (such as butter or cream).




https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fruitcake

Fruit Cart Hard Seltzer.description:
Fruit Cart is a carbonated alcoholic beverage with 4% alcohol ABV. It is produced by Golden Road Brewing CA USA . It comes in many flavors including Cucumber-Lime, Strawberry-Pineapple, Mango, and Watermelon.

A 12 once can contain 95-110 calories and 7.9-9 grams of carbs
1 ounce contains 7.9-9.17 calories and 0.7-0.8 carbs

Fruit Chaat.description: Fruit Chat is basically a mixture of different fruits marinated with Chaat masala. It is really delicious and very easy to make. Fruits are cut into small pieces. And then chaat masala, sugar is added and served fresh.

Fruit Cream.ingredients: hung curd, sugar, milk, cream, saffron, fruits
Fruit Cream.description: Fruit Cream is an Indian pudding made with fresh fruits dunked in a sweet & flavorful hung curd and cream sauce. The main ingredients are hung curd, sugar, milk, cream, saffron, fruits. The texture is creamy and tastes sweet.

Fruit Curd.ingredients: egg yolks, sugar, fruit juice, zest
Fruit Curd.description: Fruit Curd is a dessert spread and topping usually made with citrus fruit, such as lemon, lime, orange, or tangerine. Other flavor variations include passion fruit, mango, and berries such as raspberries, cranberries or blackberries. The basic ingredients are beaten egg yolks, sugar, fruit juice, and zest, which are gently cooked together until thick and then allowed to cool, forming a soft, smooth, intensely flavored spread. Some recipes also include egg whites and/or butter.

Fruit Fool.description: It s an English dessert. Traditionally, fruit fool is made by folding pureed stewed fruit (classically gooseberries) into sweet custard. Modern fool recipes often skip the traditional custard and use whipped cream. Additionally, a flavouring agent like rose water may be added.

Fruit Preserves.description:
Fruit preserves are preparations of fruits, vegetables and sugar, often canned or sealed for long-term storage.

Many varieties of fruit preserves are made globally, including sweet fruit preserves, such as those made from strawberry or apricot, and savory preserves, such as those made from tomatoes or squash. The ingredients used and how they are prepared determine the type of preserves; jams, jellies, and marmalades are all examples of different styles of fruit preserves that vary based upon the fruit used. In English, the word, in plural form, "preserves" is used to describe all types of jams and jellies.

Fruit Salad.description: Fruit salad is a dish consisting of various kinds of fruit, sometimes served in a liquid, either in their own juices or a syrup. When served as an appetizer or as a dessert, a fruit salad is sometimes known as a fruit cocktail or fruit cup. In different forms fruit salad can be served as an appetizer, a side-salad, or a dessert.

Fruit Salsa.ingredients: kiwi, raspberry, strawberry, apple, butter, cinnamon chips
Fruit Salsa.description: The fruit Salsa recipe is a sweet salsa made from diced fruit and served with cinnamon chips. It is prepared with kiwi, raspberry, strawberry, apple, butter, cinnamon chips. It is a kind of appetizer that you can serve on any occasion. It is also very healthy and tastes good.

Fruit Tart.description: Fresh Fruit Tart is a french sweet pastry dough with a firm, crumbly crust with a layer of vanilla pastry cream filling and topped with fresh fruit and a glaze.

Fruit Whip.description: These desserts made from puréed fruit and whipped egg whites. The uncooked variants are similar to a mousse, while the cooked variants are similar to soufflé. There are also variants using whole eggs, gelatin, fruits and whipping cream. A common kind of fruit whip is pruned whip, but almost any raw, dried, or cooked fruit may be used, mashed or sieved, for example, apple, strawberry, raspberry, apricot, cherry, fig, pineapple or rhubarb.

Frumenty.description: Frumenty is a popular dish in Western Europe. It was made primarily from boiled, cracked wheat including milk, eggs, broth. Also can be other recipes include almonds, currants, sugar, saffron and orange flower water.

Fry Jack.ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, vegetable oil, water
Fry Jack.description: Fry Jack is a traditional dish in the Belizean cuisine. They are deep fried dough pieces served as a breakfast item and can be shaped as squares or triangles.

Fudge Cake.description: Fudge Cake is a chocolate cake containing fudge. "Fudge cake" is also a term in the American South to refer to a dense, single-layer chocolate cake served with or without icing. It is similar to a brownie, although moister with more chocolate.

Fudge Cookie.ingredients: flour, chocolate, sugar, oil, vanilla, salt, baking soda.
Fudge Cookie.description: Fudge Cookie is a cookie included with Flour, Chocolate, Sugar, Oil, Vanilla, Salt, Baking soda and that is prepared with fudge or that has the flavour, consistency or texture of fudge. Chocolate fudge cookies are a variety, along with other fudge flavours, such as peanut butter fudge.

Fuet.ingredients: pork, spices, garlic, aniseed, black pepper
Fuet.description: Fuet is a traditional Catalan sausage made with pork meat in a natural pork casing. This thin, dry-cured sausage is commonly consumed with bread or added to other dishes such as soups and casseroles. Its flavour can vary from mildly spicy to spicy, depending on the seasonings used in its preparation. Fuet is usually flavoured with garlic, aniseed, or black pepper.

Fufu.description: It is an African cuisine. In Africa Fufu, served alongside soup, usually groundnut soup, Palm nut soup or Light Soup, is a national dish of Ghana. Soup is considered as a main dish or dinner in African cooking.

Fugazza.description: Fugazza is a common type of Argentinian pizza originating in Buenos Aires that consists of a thick, soft and airy pizza crust topped with onions, cheese, oregano and sometimes olives.

Full English Breakfast.ingredients: bacon, eggs, tomatoes, mushrooms, bread, sausages, beans
Full English Breakfast.description: A traditional full English breakfast includes bacon (traditionally back bacon), fried, poached or scrambled eggs, fried or grilled tomatoes, fried mushrooms, fried bread or toast with butter, sausages, and baked beans.

Ful Medames.description: Dish of cooked fava beans served with vegetable oil, cumin, and optionally with chopped parsley, garlic, onion, lemon juice and chili pepper. It is a staple meal in Egypt, especially in the northern cites of Cairo and Gizah. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ful_medames

Ful Medammes.ingredients: fava beans, lemon, oil, herbs, spices
Ful Medammes.description: Ful medammes is a Protein-rich fava bean mashed with garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, and tahini makes the hummus, a delicious iftar or suhoor dish. It tastes great as a dip with warm pita bread, spread on a bit of crusty bread, or with water-rich crudités like cucumber, radishes, or carrot sticks.

Funfetti Layer Cake.ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, rainbow sprinkles, eggs, milk, frosting, cream
Funfetti Layer Cake.description: Funfetti Layer Cake is one kind of cake. It is prepared with flour, sugar, baking powder, rainbow sprinkles, egg, milk, frosting, cream. The rainbow sprinkles in the cake make it look very colourful and gives a fun vibe.

Fungee And Pepperpot.ingredients: cornmeal, vegetables, meat, spicies, papaya, ketchup, margarine
Fungee And Pepperpot.description:
Cornmeal makes an appearance in many national dishes and in Antigua it is in Fungee. Prepared either as a breakfast meal or main entrée, Fungee is cornmeal with okra, cooked in salted water and boiled to a paste.  Pepperpot is a combination of a variety of meats, especially salted beef, and pig tail, and includes crushed vegetables such as spinach, eggplant, okra, onions, spices and seasonings, boiled to a soupy finish.



http://www.caribbeanandco.com/national-dishes-of-the-caribbean/

Funnel Cake.description: Funnel cake (Pennsylvania German: Drechderkuche) is a regional food popular in North America, mainly at carnivals and fairs, but can also be found at other events.

Fun\u0161terc.description: Funšterc is Slovenian national dish. In the past, it was especially popular among coal miners and their families due to its basic ingredient - egg. Egg belonged to non-standard dishes because of a low living standard of the population. The omelette must have been thick and round, but also tender and puffy. It was yellow like the sun, which the coal miners couldn't see while working underground.

Fursecuri.ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder
Fursecuri.description: It is Romanian cookie made with butter, sugar, egg, flour, baking powder and added hazelnut, almond also.

Fusilli Tomatina.description:
Fusilli pasta cooked in a herb-y, tomato-based, sensational sauce makes an easy and anytime meal.





http://food.ndtv.com/recipe-fusilli-tomatina-593395

Fuzi And Pljukanci.ingredients: truffle cream sauce or mild red sauces, pasta, hot water, onions, salt and pepper, flour, beef, boskarin, chicken, rooster, istrians, chewy, hand-rolled pljukanci
Fuzi And Pljukanci.description: Fuzi is quill-shaped homemade pasta made with wrapping each piece around the handle of a wooden spoon. It is often served with a truffle cream sauce or mild red sauces including beef, boskarin, chicken, rooster or wild game.

Gachas.description:
This is an ancestral basic dish from central and southern Spain. Its main ingredients are flour, water, olive oil, garlic and salt.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gachas

Gado-gado.description: It is an Indonesian salad of slightly boiled, blanched or steamed vegetables and hard-boiled eggs, boiled potato, fried tofu and tempeh, and lontong, served with a peanut sauce dressing.

Gaeng Daeng.description: Red curry is a popular Thai dish consisting of red curry paste cooked in coconut milk and added with meat; such as chicken, beef, pork, duck or shrimp, or vegetarian protein source such as tofu. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_curry

Gaeng Keow Wan Kai.description: Morsels of fresh chicken. Cherry-sized eggplants. Tender bamboo shoots. Sprigs of Coriander. Generous handfuls of sweet basil. These humble elements form the body of this seminal curry. The spoons of green curry paste that's stirred furiously into hot creamy coconut milk. Served alongside a bowl of fragrant Thai rice.

Gaisburger Marsch.description: This is a traditional beef stew. The meat, cooked in a strong beef broth, is cut into cubes and served with cooked potatoes and Spatzle. The broth is poured over the dish before topping with golden-brown onions fried in butter. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaisburger_Marsch

Gai Tod.description: Gai tod is simply Thai style fried chicken and is something of an obsession in Thailand. Sold from street carts, the chicken pieces – often wings or small drumsticks – are marinated in a mixture of spices and aromatics, and then dredged in rice flour, which lends an extra crispness, before being fried.

Gai Yang.description:
Thai-style grilled chicken coated in a marinade flavored with cilantro, white pepper, and fish sauce is one of the tastiest things you'll ever pull off of your grill. There's a reason you can't walk more than a few blocks in Bangkok without catching a whiff of its intense aroma.
http://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/2014/07/thai-style-grilled-chicken-recipe.html

Gajak.description: Gajak (also gachak) is a well-known dessert or confection originating in north-central India. It is a dry sweet made of sesame seeds (til) or peanuts and jaggery. The til is cooked in the raw sugar syrup and set in thin layers, which can be stored for months.

Gajar Ka Halwa.description: Gajar ka halwa is a carrot-based sweet dessert pudding from India. It is made by placing grated carrots in a pot containing a specific amount of water, milk and sugar and then cooking while stirring regularly. It is often served with a garnish of almonds and pistachios. The nuts and other items used are first sautéed in ghee, a South Asian clarified butter

Gajar Matar.description: Gajar Matar Ki Sabji is a delicious Indian dry vegetable dish made from fresh carrots and peas sautéed in oil with mild Indian spices. This simple vegetable dish is quite colourful and the fresh carrot and peas tossed in mild spices with a dash of fresh green coriander leaves are delectable and full of flavour.

Gaji Mari.description: These gorgeous eggplant rolls are healthy and easy to make. They are called gaji mari in Korean. Gaji is eggplant, and mari refers to rolled up dishes. The thinly sliced eggplants are briefly cooked in a skillet, rolled up with other vegetables, and served with a sauce.

Galaktoboureko.description:
Galaktoboureko is a Greek dessert of semolina custard in filo. The name means "milk börek". It may be made in a pan, with filo layered on top and underneath and cut into square portions, or rolled into individual servings (often approximately 10 cm (4 in) long). It is served or coated with a clear, sweet syrup. The custard may be flavored with lemon, orange, or rose.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galaktoboureko

Galayet Bandora.ingredients: tomatoes, onions, hot peppers, olive oil, salt.
Galayet Bandora.description: Galayet bandora is a simple Jordanian and Palestinian dish of tomatoes, onions, hot peppers (usually serranos or jalapenos), olive oil, and salt. Galayet bandora is usually eaten with warm pita bread. It is often garnished with toasted pine nut

Galbi.ingredients: beef ribs, sesame seeds, hot pepper paste, soybean paste
Galbi.description:
Galbi or kalbi generally refers to a variety of gui or grilled dishes in Korean cuisine that are made with marinated beef short ribs in a ganjang-based sauce.


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galbi

Galbi Jjim.ingredients: short ribs, water, carrots, red apple, onions, beef, soy sauce, garlic, onions, rice wine, sugar
Galbi Jjim.description: This is a variety of jjim or Korean steamed dish made with galbi (short rib). Beef galbi is sometimes referred to as "gari" , so the dish can be called "garijjim". Galbijjim is generally made with beef or pork short ribs. In the latter case, it is called dweji galbijjim.

Galette-saucisse.description: Galette-saucisse is a type of French street food item consisting of a hot sausage, traditionally grilled, wrapped in a cold type of crepe called galette de sarrasin or Breton galette. It is similar to Bagel Dog.

Galinhada.ingredients: chicken breasts, chicken bouillon, lemon juice, oil, scallions, garlic, rice, tomatoes, green pepper, peas, saffron, parsley, cilantro, salt, pepper
Galinhada.description: Galinhada is a rice made with chicken, saffron, and vegetables, which is a typical Brazilian dish from both the states of Minas Gerais and Goias.

Galletas De Patatas.description: Galletas de patatas , commonly sold as egg cracklets, are Filipino biscuits. They are characteristically thick and square-shaped with upturned edges. The name is derived from the curving browned lower edge which resembles a potato. It is also called galletas de huevos ("egg crackers") due to the use of egg-white glazing, or tengang daga ("mouse ears") due to its shape.

Gallo En Chicha.description:
Gallo en chicha is a traditional chicken dish in Salvadoran cuisine, although it is also eaten elsewhere in Central America, such as in Guatemala. The dish is made with rooster, Salvadoran chicha and panela. The dish is consumed in both rural and urban areas. Because cooking this dish is complicated and time-consuming, it is usually prepared for special occasions and celebrations, such as holidays or the birth of a child.

chicha - In South and Central America, chicha is a fermented or non-fermented beverage usually derived from maize. Chicha includes corn beer known as chicha de jora and non-alcoholic beverages such as chicha morada

panela - Panela is unrefined whole cane sugar, typical of Central and of Latin America in general, which is a solid form of sucrose derived from the boiling and evaporation of sugarcane juice


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gallo_en_chicha

Gallo Pinto.description:
Traditional dish of Nicaragua and Costa Rica made with rice and beans. The history of Gallo Pinto is not well known, and there are disputes between Costa Ricans and Nicaraguans about where the dish originated. One theory suggests that gallo pinto was brought into Latin America by African slaves that migrated into Latin America . Most Latin Americans agree that the dish is part of both countries now and that they share more similarities than differences. Variations of gallo pinto are popular in many countries close to the Caribbean.

Gallo pinto means "spotted rooster" in Spanish. The name is said to originate in the multi-colored or speckled appearance that results from cooking the rice together with black or red beans. Beans are quickly cooked until the juice is almost consumed. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gallo_pinto

Galuste Cu Prune.ingredients: plums, potatoes, oil, eggs, flour, sugar
Galuste Cu Prune.description: It is an easy dessert made with plum and potato. It is a kind of traditional dessert in Central and Eastern Europe made from potatoes, flour, eggs, breadcrumbs, cinnamon, and plums.

Gambas Al Ajillo.description: Gambas Al Ajillo is a popular Spanish dish found principally in the south and center of Spain. The primary ingredients consist of shrimp, garlic and olive oil but there are many variations. It's often served in Spain's tapas bars as an appetizer. However, this dish is so popular that it's occasionally offered as an entrée. https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Cookbook:Gambas_al_Ajillo

Gambas Al Pil Pil.description:
The gamba shrimp comes from Spain, however the Chilean way of preparation transformed it. It is not a well-known dish and it is served only in some selected places. It consists of shrimp tails baked in oil, garlic and salt.


http://www.trekkingchile.com/EN/chilean-cuisine-dishes.php

Gamja Jorim.ingredients: corn syrup, garlic, olive oil, potatoes, sesame oil, sesame seeds, soy sauce, sugar, water, white oyster mushrooms
Gamja Jorim.description: Korean potato side dish, Gamja Jorim goes great with any Korean meal and is great for lunch boxes because it doesn’t have to be served warm.

Gamjatang.description: Gamjatang is a pork spine soup. The Korean soup made from the neck bones of a pig. It often contains potatoes, cellophane noodles, dried radish greens, perilla leaves, green onions, hot peppers and ground sesame seeds.

Gang Keow Wan Gai.ingredients: green curry paste, coconut milk, chicken
Gang Keow Wan Gai.description: Gang Keow Wan Gai is one of the most famous and southern Thai dishes. Green curry paste, coconut milk, bamboo shoots, chicken, Thai basil, Thai eggplant and the ever-present herbs and roots of Thai cuisine (lemongrass, galangal, lime leaves etc), make this curry an unforgettable blend of delights. It is usually prepared quite soupy so a plate of rice is necessary to sop up every intricate drop.

Ganjang Gejang.ingredients: raw crabs, seasoning, chili powder, soy sauce
Ganjang Gejang.description:
A salted fermented seafood in Korean cuisine. This can be so addictive that it’s often affectionately called “rice thief,” the joke being that you keep eating more rice just so that you can have more gejang since it’s just that good. 

http://travel.cnn.com/seoul/eat/40-foods-koreans-cant-live-without-054198/

Ganmodoki.ingredients: tofu, carrots, lotus roots and burdock
Ganmodoki.description: Ganmodoki is a fried tofu fritter made with vegetables, such as carrots, lotus roots, and burdock. It may also contain egg.

Gansebraten.description: Roasted goose traditionally served with potatoes and/or Klöße with gravy and vegetables.

Gansito.ingredients: dough, butter, sugar, coconut, cream, chocolate
Gansito.description: Gansito, is a popular Mexican snack cake, filled of strawberry jelly and cream with notes of coconut, and finally covered in chocolate topped with chocolate sprinkles. It is sold in the United States and Mexico. It was created in 1957 by Marinela.

Ganthiya.description: Ganthiya is a deep-fried Indian snack made from chickpea flour. Along with Khakra, Fafda, Dhokla, and Khandvi (among others), they are among the most popular snacks originating from the Indian State of Gujarat. They are a popular teatime snack not only in Gujarat but across India and also among NRIs across the world. They are sometimes soft and not always crunchy like most other Indian snacks. A sweeter version is called Mitha Ganthiya.

G\u00e0 N\u01b0\u1edbng.description: Gà nướng is Vietnamese grilled chicken

Garantita.ingredients: chickpea flour, harissa, cumin, black pepper, oil, eggs
Garantita.description: Garantita is a popular Algerian street food item that is consumed as a snack and prepared as a kind of cake or tart. The dough is made with a combination of chickpea flour, oil, spices, and water. It is then covered with a beaten egg and baked in the oven until it develops a golden-brown colour on top. Garantita is typically served hot, dressed with harissa and cumin.

Garibaldi Biscuit.description: It is consists of currants squashed and baked between two thin oblongs of biscuit dough—a sort of currant sandwich. In this respect, it has elements in common with the Eccles cake.

Garides Saganaki.ingredients: prawns, juicy tomatoes, chilli pepper, spring onions, garlic, drink ouzo, parsley, feta cheese, olive oil, salt, pepper, sweet paprika
Garides Saganaki.description: This traditional and delicious Greek shrimp saganaki appetizer, served in every Psarotaverna.

Garlic Bread.description: Garlic bread consists of bread, topped with garlic and olive oil or butter and may include additional herbs, such as oregano or chives. It is then either grilled or broiled until toasted or baked in a conventional or bread oven. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Garlic_bread

Garnachas.description: Garnachas are tortillas, topped with meat, marinated cabbage, salsa and grated cheese.

Garrapinyades.description:
nuts (usually almonds) that have been cooked in a special way, so they end up coated in browned, crunchy sugar





https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Garrapinyades

Garri.description: In West Africa Garri is the powdery food material flour made from the tuberous roots of the cassava plant, which in the process of its manufacture is changed into dry edible granules. Wikipedia

Garrotxa.description: Garrotxa is a Catalan cheese made from pasteurized goat's milk. It can be young or aged and is characterized by its flaky, creamy, and crumbly texture. The cheese has a nutty, herbal, and milky flavour that pairs especially well with crusty bread, nuts, and white wines.

Garudiya.description:
Garudiya is a clear fish broth. It is one of the basic and traditional food items of Maldivian cuisine. The broth is based on tuna species found in the nation's ocean waters such as skipjack (kanḍumas or goḍa), yellowfin tuna (kanneli), little tunny (lațți), or frigate tuna) (raagonḍi).

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Garudiya

G\u00e2teau Basque.ingredients: almond flour, pastry cream, preserved cherries
G\u00e2teau Basque.description: Gâteau Basque is a traditional dessert from the Northern Basque region of France, typically filled with black cherry jam or pastry cream. Gâteau Basque with cream is more typical in the Southern Basque region of Spain.

Gatorade.ingredients: water, sucrose (table sugar), dextrose, citric acid, natural flavour, sodium chloride (table salt), sodium citrate, monopotassium phosphate, flavouring/colouring
Gatorade.description: The Gatorade Company, Inc. is an American manufacturer of sports-themed beverage and food products, built around its signature line of sports drinks. The main ingredients are water, sucrose (table sugar), dextrose, citric acid, natural flavour, sodium chloride (table salt), sodium citrate, monopotassium phosphate, and flavouring/colouring. It is one kind of nutrition drink designed for athletics.

Gatsby.ingredients: bread rolls, french fries, meat, sauce
Gatsby.description: Gatsby is a South African submarine sandwich typically sold as a foot-long sandwich sliced into four portions

Gatte Ka Pulao.ingredients: rice, gram flour (besan), onions, tomatoes, spices
Gatte Ka Pulao.description: Gatte ka Pulao is a traditional rice delicacy in which cooked rice is combined with gram flour dumplings, called Gatte. It is a delectable delicacy from Rajasthani cuisine.

Gatte Ki Sabji.ingredients: gram flour(besan), spices, onions, tomatoes, curd
Gatte Ki Sabji.description:
Gatte ki sabji is a Mouth-watering delicacy from Rajasthani Cuisine which has Gram flour (Besan) dumplings as the main ingredient. In this Gatte Ki Sabji recipe, Curd can be completely omitted by increasing the tomato puree quantity as I have used the base of onion-tomato along with some curd for gravy. Gatte Ki Sabji is also called Gatta curry or Besan gatte ki sabji.
t tastes good with Bajra roti, Jowar Roti, Missi Roti, or even chapati or Rice.

Gatte Ki Sabzi.ingredients: chickpea flour, heeng, spices, ghee, curd, ginger, black mustard seeds
Gatte Ki Sabzi.description: Gatte Ki Sabzi is a delicious Rajasthani curry prepared with gram flour (besan) as the base ingredient. ‘Gatte’ refers to cooked and spiced gram flour dumplings, which are then dunked into spicy curd gravy. Rajasthani gatte ki sabzi also known as besan ke gatte is one such authentic dish from Rajasthani cuisine.

Gaz Candy.description: The traditional way to serve gaz is in round pieces that are about 2 inches in diameter and up to 1/2-inch thick. A modern presentation is to serve the nougat cut into smaller rectangles.

Gazpacho.description: This is a soup made of raw vegetables and served cold, originating in the southern Spanish region of Andalusia. Gazpacho is widely eaten in Spain and neighbouring Portugal. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gazpacho

Gefilte Fish.description:
Traditionally gefilte fish is cooked and served as egg-shaped patties, like quenelles, but sometimes it is cooked in large logs or blocks and then sliced for serving. It is usually served cold or at room temperature. Each piece may be topped with a slice of carrot, with a horseradish mixture called khreyn on the side.

Due to the previous general poverty of the Jewish population in Europe and especially Eastern Europe, where the dish originated, an economical recipe for the above also may have included extra ground and soaked matza meal or bread crumbs, thus creating extra fish balls. 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gefilte_fish

Geja.description: Gaja is a traditional sweet of Bengal and Odisha. It is made with salt, oil, sugar, flour. Bangladeshi people eat this as a snack. Its texture is hard to bite but is really delicious. It is very easy to make.

Gelatin.description: It is desserts made with sweetened and flavored gelatin.

Gelato.description: It is the Italian word for ice cream. Gelato is made with a base of milk, cream, and sugar, and flavored with fruit and nut purees and other flavorings.

Gemista.ingredients: tomatoes, bell pepper, rice, sugar, oil
Gemista.description: Gemista is a traditional recipe for Greek stuffed tomatoes and/or other vegetables that are baked, until soft and nicely browned. The traditional Greek recipe for Gemista can be either vegetarian, where the Gemista are filled with rice, chopped vegetables and baked in a tomato based sauce, or they may contain minced beef or pork.

General Tso's Chicken.ingredients: chicken, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, wine, sugar, oil, peppers, batter
General Tso's Chicken.description: General Tso's Chicken is a sweet, piquant, deep-fried chicken dish that is served in North American Chinese restaurants.chunks of chicken that are dipped in a batter and deep-fried and seasoned with ginger, garlic, sesame oil, scallions, and hot chili peppers.

Genesee Beer.description:
Genesee is a "Lager - Adjunct" style beer with 4.5% ABV and 20 IBU brewed by Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. New York, United States

145 calories and 12.4 g carbs per 12 oz

Genfo.description: Genfo is a stiff porridge eaten in Ethiopia. Genfo is traditionally made with barley flour. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ga%27at

Genoa Cake.ingredients: raisins, currants, glacé cherries, flour, eggs, butter, sugar
Genoa Cake.description: Genoa Cake is a fruit cake consisting of sultanas, currants or raisins, glacé cherries, almonds, and candied orange peel or essence, cooked in a batter of flour, eggs, butter and sugar.

Genoise.description: It is an Italian sponge cake named after the city of Genoa and associated with Italian and French cuisine. A genoise is generally a fairly lean cake, getting most of its fat from egg yolks, but some recipes also add in melted butter before baking.

Georgian Solyanka.ingredients: meat beef, laurel leaf, olives, onions, carrots, pickled cucumbers, finished meat products, black pepper, lemon, black olives, salt
Georgian Solyanka.description: This is a Georgian most popular and traditional soup. Made with meat.

Geplak.description: Geplak is a Southeast Asian sweet snack, originating from Java, Indonesia, made from equal parts coarsely grated coconut and sugar, often brightly colored. Some versions include rice flour, citrus leaves, and/or waluh fruit.

Geraardsbergse Mattentaart.ingredients: puff pastry, thick buttermilk, whole milk, sugar, ground almonds, rum or almond extract, baking powder, butter
Geraardsbergse Mattentaart.description: Geraardsbergse Mattentaart is a small puff pastry pie with a tender, almond-flavored cheese curd filling called mattenbrij. The main ingredient is puff pastry, buttermilk, sugar, cheese, almond, etc.

German Chocolate Cake.description: German Chocolate Cake is a layered chocolate cake from the United States filled and topped with a coconut-pecan frosting

German Fries.description: In this preparation of fries in which potatoes are sliced into uniform sizes and shapes, fried or deep fried, and sometimes prepared with additional cooked ingredients such as onion, green pepper and bacon.

Gew\u00fcrztraminer Wine.description:
Gewürztraminer is a white wine grape originating in the Alsace region of France. It is a classic grape that likes cool climates like northeast France, Germany, and northern Italy, and is used to make a white wine of the same name. While not as well known as chardonnay and pinot grigio, it is typically very affordable and pairs well with spicy, flavorful foods. The predominant nose and flavor is lychee—a sweet, tropical fruit. It is higher in alcohol than comparable white wines.

Gewürztraminer does best in clay soils, and makes wines that are typically full-bodied and ripe, with high alcohol and relatively low acidity. They are also highly aromatic, showing perfumed notes of rose, ginger, honey and orange peel, complementing grapefruit, lychee and peach fruit. The best examples strike a balance between richness and acidity. Around the world, Gewürztraminer is made in dry, off-dry and sweet styles,

Ghai Pad Med Mamong Himmapaan.ingredients: chicken, fried cashews nut, bell pepper, baby corn, carrots, straw mushroom, onions, spring onion, dried chilli
Ghai Pad Med Mamong Himmapaan.description: Cashews nut Stir Fry with Chicken is one of famous Thai Stir fry main dish that might serve with Jasmine Stream rice, the taste are sweet from oyster sauce and fresh vegetable, salty from soy sauce.

Ghapama.description:
Armenian stuffed pumpkin dish, often prepared during the Christmas season. It is prepared by removing the guts of the pumpkin (known as դդում in Armenian, pronounced ddum in Eastern Armenian and ttum in Western Armenian) and stuffing it with boiled rice and dried fruits such as chopped almonds, apple, cornel, apricot, plums, dates, prunes and raisins. It is also common to pour on honey and mix in ground cinnamon or sugar. The pumpkin is then baked until it becomes soft, then brought to the table where it is cut up and served.



https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghapama

Gheimeh.ingredients: lamb, tomatoes, yellow split peas, onions, dried lime
Gheimeh.description: It is an Iranian and Iraqi stew consisting of meat, tomatoes, split peas, onion and dried lime. The stew is garnished with aubergine or French fries and usually served with rice.

Ghevar.ingredients: flour, ghee, kewra, milk, butter, sugar, almonds
Ghevar.description: It is traditionally associated with the Teej Festival. It is disc-shaped sweet made with all-purpose flour and soaked in sugar syrup.

Ghomi.description: Ghomi is a traditional dish from Georgia consisting of coarse and fine corn flour combined with water. Pieces of cheese such as sulguni are typically placed in the hot porridge to melt before consumption. The dish is often served with different sauces on the side, such as tkemali or bazhe.

Ghorayebah.ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, vanilla, almonds, peeled & halved, cloves
Ghorayebah.description: It Is called Ghorayeba, are easy to make with simple ingredients and delicious results.  Using the electric mixer, putting it all together is very easy. it is bite size cookies that quickly melt in your mouth and leave you desiring for more.For holidays it  is a special treat.

Ghoriba.description: Ghoriba is a type of cookie prepared in the Maghreb and other parts of the Middle East. Ghoriba is a round, shortbread cookie made with flour, sugar, butter, and usually almonds.

Ghost Pepper.description: The ghost pepper, also known as bhut jolokia is an interspecific hybrid chili pepper cultivated in Northeast India. It is a hybrid of Capsicum chinense and Capsicum frutescens and is closely related to the Naga Morich. Wikipedia

Ghugni.description:
Ghugni is a spiced chickpea or Bengal gram based curry which can be enjoyed as a stand-alone snack with toppings of onion, masalas and lemon. It can also be enjoyed as a meal with hot luchi. While it is essentially a vegetarian dish, several preparations also add cooked mutton chunks to the spicy gravy to make the treat more wholesome and tempting.

https://food.ndtv.com/food-drinks/5-famous-breakfast-dishes-from-bengal-1806410

Giambo.description: Giambo is a typical Aruban dish consisting of beef, okra, and fish such as red snapper, cooked together into a thick and hearty soup. Also known as the Antillean gumbo, this flavorful Aruban version of the famous Cajun speciality is characterized by puréed okra, giving the dish its unique, slippery consistency.

Gianduja.description: Gianduja is a sweet chocolate spread containing about 30% hazelnut paste.

Giant Pork Balls Soup.description: Taiwanese Giant pork balls soup is a popular recipe in Taiwan for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Taiwanese meatball literally means pounded balls and the reason is because the meat requires a lot of pounding to break the proteins into strands that convert the meat from a soft mushy ball into a springy meatball with a good bite and chew.

Gibanica.ingredients: phyllo dough, white cheese, eggs, oil, flour
Gibanica.description: Gibanica is a traditional pastry dish from Serbia popular all over the Balkans. It is usually made with white cheese and eggs. Recipes can range from sweet to savory, and from simple to festive and elaborate multi-layered cakes. Gibanica is considered a breakfast meal but a foodie would have it at any time of day.

Gigantes Plaki.ingredients: gigantes beans, olive oil, garlic, onions, , parsley, celery, water, tomatoes, oregano, salt, pepper
Gigantes Plaki.description:
This is a classic Greek recipe, consisting of ‘giant’ beans baked in a tomato sauce along with plenty of fresh herbs, which give a really unique taste.

It is a Greek dish known in English as giant baked beans. The name Gigantes comes from the Greek word for giants, hence giant beans. Gigandes plaki is a vegetarian meze dish that consists of large dried white runner beans (fasolia gigandes) cooked in a tomato-based sauce.

Gimbap.description: This is a Korean dish made from steamed white rice  and various other ingredients, rolled in gim (sheets of dried laver seaweed) and served in bite-size slices. Gimbap is often eaten during picnics or outdoor events, or as a light lunch, served with danmuji or kimchi. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gimbap

Gim Bugak.ingredients: glutinous rice flour, kim, salt, seaweed paper, shredded red pepper, toasted sesame seeds, vegetable oil, water
Gim Bugak.description: Fried seaweed paper coated with glutinous rice paste.

Gimlet.description: Gimlet is a cocktail made of gin and lime juice.

Gin.description: Gin is liquor which is distilled from juniper berries. Gin is one of the broadest categories of spirits because of its versatility, there are more classic cocktails made with gin than with any other spirit.

Ginataang Halo Halo.ingredients: rice, tapioca pearls, sweet potatoes, purple yam, tropical fruits, coconut milk
Ginataang Halo Halo.description: This is a delicious and filling snack specially if you love anything with coconut milk in it. Ginataang Halo Halo is also perfect during rainy days. Ginataang Halo Halo is an old-time favorite of Filipinos. Typically made with glutinous rice balls, tapioca pearls, sweet potatoes, purple yam, tropical fruits and coconut milk.

Ginataang Langka.description: Unripe jackfruit cooked with coocnut milk. You can cook it without any meat if you are vegetarian.

Ginger Beef.description: It is usually refers to a westernized version of a Chinese dish made from beef and ginger.

Gingerbread House.description: A gingerbread house is a novelty confectionery shaped like a building that is made of cookie dough, cut and baked into appropriate components like walls and roofing. The usual material is crisp ginger biscuit made of gingerbread – the ginger nut. Wikipedia

Ginisang Ampalaya.ingredients: ampalaya, garlic, black pepper, salt, eggs, tomatoes, onions
Ginisang Ampalaya.description: Ginisang Ampalaya is a Filipino vegetable stew. It is made with ampalaya, garlic, black pepper, salt, eggs, tomato, onion, It is one of the healthiest dishes. This food is very good for diabetic patients. The dish can also be made with pork or shrimp and other vegetables. The dish is characteristically savory and slightly bitter due to the ingredients used.

Ginjinha.description: Portuguese liqueur made by infusing ginja berries, (sour cherry) (Prunus cerasus austera, the Morello cherry) in alcohol (aguardente is used) and adding sugar together with other ingredients. Ginjinha is served in a shot form with a piece of the fruit in the bottom of the cup. It is a favourite liqueur of many Portuguese and a typical drink in Lisbon, Alcobaça and Óbidos. Other regions produce ginja with protected designation of origin, for example the Ginja Serra da Estrela.

Gin Rickey.description: The rickey is a highball drink made from gin or bourbon, half of a lime squeezed and dropped in the glass, and carbonated water. Little or no sugar is added to the rickey.

Giouvetsi.description: Giouvetsi is a baked Greek dish made with chicken, lamb or beef and pasta, and tomato sauce (usually spiced with allspice and sometimes cinnamon, cloves or bay leaves). Other common ingredients include onions/shallots, garlic, beef stock, and red wine, as well as some cheese to serve. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giouvetsi

Githeri.ingredients: maize dhania hoho (red), boiled beans, tomatoes, pureed, spices, herbs
Githeri.description: Githeri is a Kenyan traditional meal of maize and legumes, mostly beans of any type mixed and boiled together. The maize and beans are mixed together in a sufuria or pot, water is then added and the mixture boiled until the food is cooked and ready to eat.

Gizzada.ingredients: pastry flour, shortening, grace margarine, sugar
Gizzada.description: Gizzada or Grizzada also referred to as pinch-me-round, and known as Guizada in the Portuguese language, is a pastry in Jamaican cuisine and Portuguese cuisine. The tart is contained in a small, crisp pastry shell with a pinched crust and filled with a sweet and spiced coconut filling. Trinidad also has a similar treat referred to as the Coconut Tart.

Gjize.description: Gjizë is a type of dry curded cheese, made from yoghurt and citric acid. The texture and taste resemble sour ricotta, but gjizë can be enriched with garlic, herbs, salt or other spices. Gjizë can be consumed as it is, used as a filling for burek, or as a part of another typical Albanian dish, Fërgesë.

Glamorgan Sausage.description: a Welsh vegetarian sausage. It contains no meat or skin, instead it is made with cheese, generally Caerphilly, but sometimes cheddar, along with leek or spring onion. This mixture is then coated in breadcrumbs and rolled into a sausage shape before cooking. Glamorgan sausages date back to at least the early 19th century, at which point the sausages would have contained pork fat.

Glorified Rice.description: Glorified Rice is a dessert salad served in Minnesota and other states in the Upper Midwest. It is popular in more rural areas with sizable Lutheran populations of Scandinavian heritage. It is made from rice, crushed pineapple, and whipped cream.

Gnocchi.description: A dish of little dumplings made from potatoes, semolina, flour, or a combination of these ingredients.

Goan Shrimp Curry.description: Shrimp cooked in an exotic blend of spices and coconut

Goat Biryani.description: Goat version of the famous biryani dish

Goat Caldereta.description: There are many ways how to cook caldereta and you can choose different meat but goat meat is special for it has a distinct flavor. It is advised to marinate the goat meat first before you saute it with the spices then stew with tomato sauce.

Goat Cheese.description: Goats' cheese, or chèvre, is cheese made from goat's milk. Goat cheeses are made in a wide variety of styles, from soft fresh cheese to hard aged cheese. Wikipedia

Goat Cheese Empandas.ingredients: crust pie, sweet onion, goat cheese, tomatoes, oil
Goat Cheese Empandas.description: Goat Cheese Empanadas are empanadas made with the fillings of goat cheese. The ingredients that are needed are crust pie, sweet onion, goat cheese, tomatoes, oil. With these few ingredients delicious empanadas can be made.

Goat Water.ingredients: goat meat, breadfruit, vegetables, onions, tomatoes, spices, herbs, flour.
Goat Water.description:
Goat water, also referred to as kiddy stew, is a stew that is a part of the national cuisine of the Caribbean island of Montserrat It has been described as a national dish of Montserrat. It has also been described as a national stew.



https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goat_water

Gobi Manchurian Gravy.description: Gobi Manchurian Gravy is a combination of deep fried cauliflower florets and a spicy cornflour based thick gravy prepared in traditional Chinese way.

Gobi Matar.description: It is Punjabi style recipe. This is semi dry kind of curry. All the tomato puree and spices get absorbed by the cauliflower and peas. And this makes it so flavorful.

Gobi Paratha.ingredients: flour, ghee, cauliflower, ginger, spices, coriander, salt
Gobi Paratha.description: Gobi paratha is a type of paratha or parantha (flatbread), originating from the Indian subcontinent, that is stuffed with flavoured cauliflower and vegetables. It is usually consumed during breakfast along with curd, butter or pickle. It is prepared with flour, ghee, cauliflower, ginger, spices, coriander, salt.

Gochujang.ingredients: red chili, glutinous rice, soybeans, salt
Gochujang.description: Gochujang is a savory, spicy, and pungent fermented Korean condiment made from red chili, glutinous rice, fermented soybeans, and salt.

Goep.ingredients: tripe, dry chilli, green onion, spices, vegetables, herbs
Goep.description: Goep is a dish of Bhutan which has slices of tripe stir-fried with dried chilies, green onions, and sometimes small vegetables, which is an excellent dish.

Goetta.ingredients: pinhead oats, pork, onions, spices, herbs
Goetta.description: Goetta is a meat-and-grain sausage or mush of German inspiration that is popular in the greater Cincinnati area. It is primarily composed of ground meat (pork, or pork and beef), pin-head oats and spices.

Gofio.description: It is the Canarian name for flour made from roasted grains (typically wheat or certain varieties of maize) or other starchy plants (e.g. beans and, historically, fern root), some varieties containing a little-added salt.

Gogigui.ingredients: beef, lettuce, green onions, garlic, salt, black pepper, sugar, sesame oil, toasted sesame seeds, hot pepper flakes, hot pepper paste, soybean paste
Gogigui.description: Gogigui refers to the popular method in Korean cuisine of grilling meat, typically beef, pork, or chicken. Such dishes are often prepared on gas or charcoal grills built into the dining table itself. Some Korean restaurants that do not have built-in grills provide customers with portable stoves for diners to use at their tables.

Goi.ingredients: vegetables, meat, onions, garlic, pepper, salt
Goi.description: Goi is a generic term for "salad" in Vietnam but doesn't usually involve any lettuce. The base instead can be a pile of thinly sliced green papaya or mango, lotus root, cabbage or pomelo.

G\u1ecfi Cu\u1ed1n.description: This dish traditionally consisting of pork, prawn, vegetables, bún (rice vermicelli), and other ingredients wrapped in Vietnamese bánh tráng (commonly known as rice paper).

Gokul Pithe.ingredients: coconut, gur, flour, water, khoya, ghee, baking soda
Gokul Pithe.description: Gokul Pithe is a traditional dish that is made on the festival of Makar Sankranti or Poush Parbon in Bengali homes. These are sweet fried dumplings, soaked in thick hot sugar syrup. The filling is mostly of grated coconut and jaggery. Made easily with simple ingredients, Gokul pithe is simply an irresistible dish to relish!

Go\u0142\u0105bki.description:
Cabbage roll common in Polish cuisine made from lightly soft-boiled cabbage leaves wrapped around minced pork or beef, chopped onions, and rice or barley, which are baked in a casserole dish and are usually served with a creamy tomato sauce.


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Go%C5%82%C4%85bki

Golden Monkey Beer.description: Golden Monkey is an American beer of the Tripel style with a 9.50% ABV Brewed by Victory Brewing Company - Downingtown Pennsylvania, United States.

Golfeados.description: Golfeados is a dish which made by rolling the sweet roll dough with a mixture of papelon (a sugary substance which is the by-product of sugar cane processing) and queso llanero, a type of cheese. The sweet rolls are then baked, upon which is sprinkled sweet syrup and more cheese!

Golubtsy.description: Golubtsy is a Russian dish as well as European cuisine.This name usually refers to ground beef mixed with boiled rice or buckwheat wrapped in cabbage leaves.

Gomen Be Siga.ingredients: collard greens, beef, onions, green peppers, niter kebbeh
Gomen Be Siga.description: Gomen Besiga is an Ethiopian dish made of Collard Greens with Lamb.

Gomen Wat.description: Ethiopian Collard Greens. Braised collard greens and kale seasoned with aromatics

Gond Ke Laddu.ingredients: wheat flour, jagerry, gond, coconut, ghee
Gond Ke Laddu.description: Gond Ke Laddu made using edible gum resin (gond), whole wheat flour, heaps of makhana, chironji, various seeds, and enriching dry fruits. It is a uber-healthy snack or dessert option.

Gondo Datshi.description:
Butter egg fry, or gondo datshi, is like the ultimate Bhutanese scrambled eggs you can imagine.

Eggs, are scrambled up with datshi cheese, and a huge amount of butter, and in some cases small bits of dried chili. The result is a very condensed scrambled egg cheese mixture that is fragrant from butter and packed with heartiness.

Gong Bao Chicken.description:
This is a famous Sichuan-style specialty, popular with both Chinese and foreigners. The major ingredients are diced chicken, dried chili, and fried peanuts.



http://www.chinahighlights.com/travelguide/chinese-food/eight-chinese-dishes.htm

Good Company Hard Seltzer.description:
Good Company is a hard seltzer style alcoholic beverage containing 5% alcohol by volume. It comes in many flavors including Apple + Pear, Black Cherry, Peach, Mountain Berry, and Honeydew

A 12 once can contain 100 calories and 2 grams of carbs
1 ounce contains 8.3 calories and 0.2 carbs

Good Morning Beer.description:
Good Morning is a "Stout - American Imperial" Style beer with 8.4% ABV and 65 IBU brewed by "Tree House Brewing Company, Massachusetts, United States".

Creamy mousse-like head, with aromas of rich milk chocolate, cocoa powder, and dark amber maple syrup.

Gooey Butter Cake.ingredients: wheat flour, butter, sugar, eggs, powdered sugar
Gooey Butter Cake.description:
Gooey butter cake is a type of cake traditionally made in the American Midwest city of St. Louis. Gooey butter cake is generally served as a type of coffee cake and not as a formal dessert cake. There are two distinct variants of the gooey butter: a bakers' gooey butter and a cream cheese and commercial yellow cake mix variant. It is believed to have originated in the 1930s.


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gooey_butter_cake

Goose IPA Beer.description: Goose IPA is a "IPA - English" style American beer with 5.9% ABV and 55 IBU brewed by Goose Island Beer Co. Illinois, United States

Gopchang.description: It refers to the small intestines from pork or cattle, which, chopped into rounded sections, can be cooked into soups, stir-fried, or grilled. Grilled, it is yet another important aspect of Korean barbecue culture. Chewy without being rubbery.

Goraasa be Dama.description: Goraasa be Dama is a Sudanese dish composed of beef stew served over easy flatbread. Flatbread is mostly found in a variety of Sudanese dishes.

Gordita.description:
Small cake made with masa and stuffed with cheese, meat or other fillings. It is similar to a pasty and to the Colombian/Venezuelan arepa. Gordita means "little fat one" in Spanish. A gordita is typically fried in a deep wok-shaped comal or baked on a regular comal.

A gordita is typically prepared as a thick tortilla. The dough is most commonly made of nixtamalized corn flour, as also used for tortillas, but can also be of wheat flour, particularly in northern Mexico close to the U.S border. An old variant of corn gorditas uses masa quebrada (broken dough) where the corn meal is coarsely ground, leaving bits of broken grain. Gorditas de migas is a version in which fried pork is mixed with the dough.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gordita

Gored Gored.description: This is a raw beef dish eaten in Ethiopia and Eritrea. It is cubed and left unmarinated. It is widely popular and considered a national dish. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gored_gored

Gorgonzola Cheese.description: Gorgonzola is a veined Italian cheese, made from unskimmed cow's milk. It can be buttery or firm, crumbly and quite salty, with a "bite" from its blue veining. Wikipedia

Gosh-E Fil.description:
is an Afghan and Iranian doughnut made by shaping dough into the shape of an ear (gosh), and deep-fried in oil. Each shape is then topped with chopped pistachios and powdered sugar. The Afghans usually make gosh-e fil for Eid ul-Fitr (religious celebration)







https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gosh-e_Fil

Gosh Feel.description: It is an Afghan and Iranian doughnut made by shaping dough into the shape of an ear (gosh), and deep-fried in oil.

Gosht Korma.ingredients: mutton, oil, salt, ginger paste, spice, curd
Gosht Korma.description: Gosht Korma is a great recipe that belongs to Bhopal's Nawabi cuisine. Mutton chunks are doused in a rich and spicy gravy seasoned with whole spices.

Goto.description:
Goto is one of  the many variants of Filipino congee or as colloquially known, lugaw. This rice porridge is made with glutinous rice and beef tripe simmered in a ginger-based broth. It’s a delicious one-bowl meal commonly peddled in the Philippines as a filling midday snack or as a light lunch.
https://www.kawalingpinoy.com/goto/

Gotu Kola Mallung.ingredients: gotu kola, onions, green chili, grated coconut, pepper, salt
Gotu Kola Mallung.description: Mallung is very much a part of the Sri Lankan diet. They deliver a dose of vitamins to a meal loaded with carbs and protein while adding colourful aesthetic appeal.  Mallum or mallung is made with chopped greens and chilies then seasoned with salt, pepper and lemon juice as well as ginger, shallots and a sprinkling of fresh grated coconut. Gotu kola leaves (Asiatic pennywort) are used to make a tangy, salad-like taboulleh.

Gouda Cheese.description: Gouda is a mild-flavored, yellow cow's milk cheese originating from the Netherlands. It is one of the most popular cheeses worldwide. The name is used today as a general term for numerous similar cheeses produced in the traditional Dutch manner. Wikipedia

Goulash.ingredients: meat, noodles, vegetables, potatoes, paprika, spices
Goulash.description:
Goulash is a soup or stew of meat and vegetables, seasoned with paprika and other spices. Originating from the medieval Kingdom of Hungary, goulash is also a popular meal in Central Europe, Eastern Europe, the Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Scandinavia and Southern Europe.


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goulash

Gozinaki.description: Gozinaki or Gozinaqi is a traditional Georgian confection made of caramelized nuts, usually walnuts, fried in honey, and served exclusively on New Year's Eve and Christmas.

Gozleme.description: This is a traditional savory Turkish flatbread and pastry dish, made of hand-rolled leaves of yufka dough that are lightly brushed with butter and eggs, filled with various toppings, sealed, and cooked over a griddle. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%B6zleme

Graavilohi.description: Graavilohi is a traditional dish of Finnish. It's a salmon's dish that has been cold cured with salt and fresh dill.

Grain Belt Premium Beer.description: Grain Belt Premium is an American Lager style beer with 4.7% alcohol by volume ABV brewed by August Schell Brewing Company Minnesota, United States

Granadilla.description: Granadilla is a roundish oval fruit with a shiny orange skin. The skin is hard and inedible but is easy to cut. The fruit contains a jelly-like pulp with black edible seeds. It can be easily cracked and removed piece by piece, like a boiled egg’s shell, from the soft, white, edible pith-like thing that contains the seeds and pulp. Inside the white part, the juice and membranous stuff are a clear to very light gray color tinged with yellow. The taste of this fruit is sweet.

Granita.description: Granita is a semi-frozen dessert made from sugar, water and various flavorings. Common and traditional flavoring ingredients include lemon juice, mandarin oranges, jasmine, coffee, almonds, mint, and when in season wild strawberries and black mulberries.

Granizado.ingredients: shaved ice, semi-sweet milk, fruit syrup, chocolate syrup
Granizado.description: It is an icy beverage. In Colombia it consists of crushed or shaved ice with semi-sweet milk, fruit syrup or chocolate syrup dripped on top.

Granola.description: Granola is a breakfast food and snack food consisting of rolled oats, nuts, honey or other sweeteners such as brown sugar, and sometimes puffed rice, that is usually baked until it is crisp, toasted and golden brown. It also serves as a topping for various pastries, desserts or ice cream.

Grape Pie.description: Grape pie is a type of fruit pie. The Concord grape variety is prepared as part of harvest time traditions in parts of the United States.

Grasshopper Cocktail.ingredients: vanilla ice cream, crème de menthe, crème de cacao
Grasshopper Cocktail.description: A Grasshopper cocktail is a sweet, mint-flavoured, after-dinner drink. The name of the drink derives from its green colour, which comes from crème de menthe. It is prepared with  vanilla ice cream, crème de menthe,  crème de cacao.

Grass Jelly.ingredients: platostoma palustre stalks, leaves, potassium carbonate, starch, sugar
Grass Jelly.description: Grass Jelly is a jelly-like dessert.It is made using the Platostoma palustre plant (a member of the mint family) and has a mild, slightly bitter taste. It is served chilled, with other toppings such as fruit, or in bubble tea or other drinks.

Gratinee Des Halles.description: Type of soup usually based on meat stock and onions, and often served gratinéed with croutons and cheese on top. Although ancient in origin, the dish underwent a resurgence of popularity in the 1960s in the United States due to a greater interest in French cuisine. French onion soup is usually served as a starter. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_onion_soup

Grattachecca.description: Grattachecca is a cold dessert originating in Rome, Italy, commonly sold in kiosks and bars. It consists of manually shaved ice flavored with sweet sciroppo.

Gray Shrimp Croquettes.ingredients: shrimps, butter, gelatin, milk, fresh cream, eggs, bread crumbs, flour, cornstarch, spices.
Gray Shrimp Croquettes.description: Gray shrimp croquettes is a Belgian dish prepared with shrimp, butter, gelatin, milk, fresh cream, eggs, bread crumbs, flour, cornstarch, spices. It tastes good and can be eaten during lunch or dinner.

Greek Panzanella Salad.ingredients: oil, french bread, olives, feta cheese, tomatoes, peppers, onions, spices, mustard
Greek Panzanella Salad.description: Greek Panzanella Salad is an Italian salad. It is also called Bread salad. The ingredients that are need are oil, french bread, olives, feta cheese, tomatoes, peppers, onion, spices, mustard. It is very healthy and delicious.

Greek Salad.ingredients: lettuce, feta cheese, tomatoes, red onion, olives, cucumbers, oregano, oil & vinegar
Greek Salad.description:
Greek salad is made with pieces of tomatoes, sliced cucumbers, onion, feta cheese, and olives (usually Kalamata olives), typically seasoned with salt and oregano, and dressed with olive oil. Common additions include green bell pepper slices or berries of capers (especially in the Dodecanese islands).

Outside Greece, "Greek salad" may be a lettuce salad with Greek-inspired ingredients, even though the original dish is distinguished by the absence of lettuce. 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greek_salad

Green Beans With Cherry Tomatoes.ingredients: string beans, onions, garlic, tomatoes, parsley, cayenne pepper
Green Beans With Cherry Tomatoes.description: Green Beans with Cherry Tomatoes is a common dish from Israel. It is prepared with string beans, onion, garlic, tomatoes, parsley and cayenne pepper. It is a dish for vegan people. People can eat this dish for a healthy diet. It is simple to make and tastes good.

Green Coconut Water.description: Green Coconut Water is also available in the street and it is fine, safe and nutritious to drink. It's especially found in the summer.

Green Jackfruit Curry.description: The young green jackfruit called polos is sliced into small chunks and boiled until soft. It's then cooked with onions, garlic, ginger and spices such as mustard seeds, turmeric, chili powder, curry powder and pandan leaves. Coconut milk has to be added towards the end and simmered to reduce most of the liquid, leaving all the beautiful flavors within the cubes of jackfruit!

Green Mango Salad.description: This salad is more refreshing and citrusy, and less pungent and spicy, with that same winning combination of sweet, sour, savory, and crunchy. Shavings of green mango are mixed with shallots and Asian basil and mint, and vegetables including carrots, red and green peppers, and tomatoes. The dressing is made with shallots, garlic, lime juice, fish sauce, palm sugar, and just a tiny bit of bird’s eye chili. A small portion of green mango salad often turns up as a relish with grilled fish and meats.

Green Onion Pancake.description: Burmese version of the Chinese dish Scallion Pancakes

Green Tea.description: Green Tea is a type of tea that is made from Camellia sinensis leaves that have not undergone the same withering and oxidation process used to make oolong and black tea.

Green Tea Bingsu.ingredients: green tea icecream, shaved ice, sweet red beans, sugar, roasted rice powder, strawberries, bananas, kiwi, melon, syrup, rice marshmallows, jelly candies, rice crispies
Green Tea Bingsu.description: Bingsu is a favorite summer dessert in South Korea, consisting of shaved ice and fruits. Any flavor of icecream can be substitute for own taste.1/2 cups shaved ice into small round bowl. Place upside-down in serving bowl to create a nice mound of ice. Repeat 3 more times so you have 4 bowls of ice. Add 1 tablespoon red beans, 1 teaspoon rice powder and 1/4 cup of chopped up fruit around ice in each bowl. Pour flavored syrup on ice, place some bingsu dduk and sprinkle with jelly candy, or colored rice crispies if desired. Serve immediately. It is look like very delicious and tasty full.

Green Tea Ice Cream.ingredients: heavy cream, milk, salt, eggs, sugar, matcha
Green Tea Ice Cream.description: Green Tea Ice Cream is a Japanese ice cream flavor. This flavor is extremely popular in Japan. Green tea ice cream is also sold in monaka form. It has been available in the United States.

Greixonera.ingredients: milk, eggs, sugar, ensaimada, cinnamon, lemon zest
Greixonera.description: Greixonera is a traditional Balearic dessert made with leftover ensaimada—a spiral-shaped sweet pastry. Similar to a bread pudding, greixonera consists of pieces of ensaimada that are combined with milk and eggs and the whole combination is then baked until firm and golden brown. The cake is often flavoured with cinnamon or lemon zest, and it is traditionally served bottom-side-up and comes dusted with ground cinnamon. Greixonera is typically prepared in the days following certain special events with the leftover ensaimada.

Greixonera De Brossat.ingredients: sugar, eggs, cinnamon, lemon zest, brossat.
Greixonera De Brossat.description: Greixonera de brossat is a traditional type of cheesecake. It's made with sugar, eggs, cinnamon, lemon zest, and brossat (also known as requesón) – fresh cottage cheese made from cow's milk, although ricotta is also a good substitute. The ingredients are blended until creamy, then poured into a baking dish and baked until firm. Greixonera de brossat is served chilled, ideally dusted with confectioners' sugar and cinnamon. The word greixonera refers to the clay baking dish in which the dessert is prepared. This cheesecake was traditionally made for Easter, but today it can be found in the Balearic Islands throughout the year.

Gribenes.description:
Chicken or goose skin cracklings with fried onions, a kosher food somewhat similar to pork rinds. A byproduct of the preparation of schmaltz by rendering chicken or goose fat.

This food is often associated with the Jewish holidays Hanukkah and Rosh Hashanah. Traditionally, gribenes were served with potato kugel or latkes during Hannukkah.


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gribenes

Gribnoy Soup.ingredients: mushrooms, potatoes, onions, carrots, parsley-root, celery-root, bay leaves, flour, water, salt, pepper, kale, vegetable oil
Gribnoy Soup.description: This is a special soup of Belarusian. This is served hot or cold with sour cream.

Griebrei.description:
Grießbrei is a traditional German pudding based on semolina. The dish is made with milk, semolina, and sugar. It's often flavored with vanilla and cinnamon. The milk is heated, the semolina stirred in, and the mixture is then stirred until it becomes creamy and thick.

Most people like to eat semolina pudding for breakfast, and the dish is sometimes enhanced with the addition of fruit such as cherries, strawberries, peaches, pears, or apples. It's recommended to serve it in a shallow bowl since there's more surface area to cover with the desired toppings.

Grillades.description:
Grillades are medallions of various meats, conventionally beef, but veal and pork are also used in modern recipes. Often served with gravy at breakfast or brunch over grits, they are a traditional Creole food.



https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grillades

Grilled Cheese Sandwich.description: A grilled cheese sandwich is a sandwich generally made with one or more varieties of cheese (a cheese sandwich) on any sort of grilled or toasted bread, such as flat bread or wheat bread, that may include spreads such as butter or mayonnaise.

Grilled Chicken And Naan Roti.description: Grilled Chicken has become very popular in Bangladesh. You can find mouth-watering grill chicken in every street like a food cart/vendor. Chicken is marinated with spices and then grilled. Its served with naan roti along with mayonnaise, sauce or chili chatni.

Grilled Corn Salad.ingredients: corn, green pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, citrus dressing
Grilled Corn Salad.description: Grilled Corn Salad is prepared with corn, green pepper,  cherry tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, citrus dressing. Corn is grilled along with these ingredients and served with the dressing.

Grilled Gaucho Steak With Chimichurri.ingredients: onions, olive oil, water, pita breads, tomatoes, cheese, smoked paprika, salt, at-leaf parsley, bay leaves, garlic, oregano leaves, red wine, black pepper
Grilled Gaucho Steak With Chimichurri.description: Grilled Gaucho Steak With Chimichurri is a Argentina's dish.

Grilled Halloumi.description: These mini-slabs of chewy goodness are made from goat and sheep milk. Unlike other cheeses, no acid or bacteria is used during processing.

Grilled Matsutake Mushrooms.ingredients: matsutake mushrooms, sodium, mirin, ginger, scallions, oil
Grilled Matsutake Mushrooms.description: Grilled Matsutake Mushrooms is a dish made with Japanese mushrooms. This mushroom is hard to grow and very rare. For this reason, it is one of the most expensive food. It is prepared with  Matsutake Mushrooms, sodium, mirin, ginger, scallion, oil.

Grilled Oysters.description:
oysters with black bean sauce, oysters with chili oil and garlic, and wannabe French oysters in 'cheese' sauce

http://travel.cnn.com/shanghai/eat/40-shanghai-foods-we-just-cant-live-without-964251/

Grilled Pork Ribs.ingredients: pork ribs, garlic, kosher salt, cumin seed, dried oregano, paprika, chile powder, scallions, sugar, orange juice, vegetable oil, red wine vinegar, mango grilling glaze, salt, pepper
Grilled Pork Ribs.description: Pork ribs are a popular addition to the Latin American grill. They are prepared many different ways in South America

Grilled Pork Sausage.description: Grilled pork sausage is an Uruguayan dish which is prepared with pork sausages, butter, bread. The pork sausages are grilled with butter on the pan and then served on bread topped with herbs.

Grilled Teriyaki Salmon Jaw.description: Salmon jaw that has been marinated in Terikaki sauce and then grilled. It is a sweet and rich dish.

Gringas.description: Gringas (Spanish pronunciation: feminine form of gringo) are a variety of tacos which uses as a base a quesadilla, consisting of a flour tortilla filled with cheese (quesadilla) and "al pastor" meat (spiced pork), topped with cheese. This is then grilled in the same manner as a quesadilla.

Grits.description:
Hominy is a food which consists of dried maize kernels that have been treated with an alkali in a process called nixtamalization. Grits are made by boiling ground hominy, and usually served with other flavorings as a breakfast dish, usually savory. They may also be found as an evening entrée when made with shrimp. 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grits

Griyo.description: Griyo is a traditional dish of Haiti. Fried pork is most often served with cabbage salad, spicy pikliz (onions and other vegetables marinated in a spicy vinegar sauce) and black rice.

Groaty Pudding.description: Groaty Pudding is a traditional dish from the Black Country in England. It is made from soaked groats, beef, leeks, onion and beef stock.

Gruel.description: Gruel is a food consisting of some type of cereal—oat, wheat or rye flour, or rice—boiled in water or milk. Gruel is a thinner version of porridge that may be more often drunk than eaten and may not need to be cooked.

Grunkohl Und Kohlwurst.description: A sausage made from lung and served with Kale.

Gruy\u00e8re Cheese.description: Gruyère is a hard yellow Swiss cheese that originated in the cantons of Fribourg, Vaud, Neuchâtel, Jura, and Berne in Switzerland. It is named after the town of Gruyères. In 2001, Gruyère gained the appellation d'origine contrôlée. Gruyère is sweet but slightly salty, with a flavor that varies widely with age. Wikipedia

Gua Bao.ingredients: bun, pork belly, pickled mustard greens, cilantro
Gua Bao.description: True Taiwanese pork belly buns have five defining components: the fluffy steamed bun, tender braised pork belly, pickled mustard greens, fresh cilantro, and powdered peanuts. All combined, it's a messy, colorful, glorious snack of salty, sweet, pungent, and fresh flavors, with multiple textures to boot.

Guacamole.description: It is an avocado-based dip or salad first created by Mexico.  it is used in modern Mexican cuisine.

Guacho De Mariscos.ingredients: rice, onions, garlic, salt, seafood broth
Guacho De Mariscos.description: It’s basically a kind of thick rice soup with yams, yucca, mixed vegetables and mixed seafood. It can also be served with beef instead of seafood.

Guajolota.description: Guajolota is a sandwich composed of a tamal placed inside a bolillo or telera. It is a form of street food commonly found in Mexico City and within the State of Mexico.

Guatemalan Tamales.ingredients: meat or veggies, maize, spices, banana leaf
